msg: Use byte and char arrays instead casting

author: fuankg

author: bayard
msg: Performance improvement. Switching from looping through a doubled array to using a Map. This probably costs more for simple cases like Java/EcmaScript/Xml, but makes up for it in the Html case. This gets performance of the testUnescapeHexCharsHtml method back down to near the same region as the original code

author: bayard
msg: Adding a simple unit test for text translate. More needed, though StringEscapeUtils does do a good job of hitting a high level of coverage for these classes already. It's easier to debug when you have tighter testing.
